{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "Scrolling Contents Layer",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF",
      "invalidations": [
        [20, 0, 100, 100],
        [120, 33, 20, 21],
        [0, 33, 20, 21],
        [120, 80, 20, 20],
        [0, 80, 20, 20]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
